| HistoryText             = After [[Decimation|M-Day]], the "'''Reals''''" formed into a gang in [[Mutant Town]] to chase out any former [[Homo superior|mutants]]. It is unclear where the movement originally started: college campuses, bars, KKK meetings. The only membership requirements appear to be always being [[Homo sapiens|human]] and be glad so many mutants were booted down to being plain old humans.{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #3}}

They started the first major riot in Mutant Town after M-Day, when they acted a former mutant near the [[X-Factor Investigations Headquarters (Mutant Town)|headquarters of X-Factor Investigations]]. The riot quickly moved to [[Mutant Square]] as [[Guido Carosella (Earth-616)|Strong Guy]], [[Rahne Sinclair (Earth-616)|Wolfsbane]], and several former mutants fighting the Reals. The [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|NYPD]] came to contain the riot, but the arrival of [[Theresa Cassidy (Earth-616)|Siryn]] ended the skirmish.{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #4}}

The Reals have not been seen since.
